history.title: Our History
history.description: At the beginning of 1994, the company began its first commercial activities as a trading establishment, founding a commercial complex specializing in household appliances and equipment. the great success of the complex served as a strong motivation to expand in the commercial field and later to diversify into specialized trade sectors, manufacturing, and several other fields such as contracting and elevators, the establishment was then transformed into "Abdullah Abdulkarim Al Othaim United Company".

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional services and products across all our sectors while maintaining the highest standards of quality and customer satisfaction.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The core principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Striving for the highest standards in everything we do

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Embracing new technologies and creative solutions

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Conducting business with honesty and transparency

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to sustainable growth and environmental responsibility
